add.title: Un nouveau membre vient de débarquer !
add.description:
• **Nom d'utilisateur** : <@{{member.id}}> - {{member.displayName}} ({{member.id}})
• **Compte créé le** : <t:{{createdTimestamp}}:f> (<t:{{createdTimestamp}}:R>)
• **Nous a rejoint le** : <t:{{joinedTimestamp}}:f> (<t:{{joinedTimestamp}}:R>)

remove.title: Un membre vient de nous quitter !
remove.description:
• **Nom d'utilisateur** : <@{{member.id}}> - {{member.displayName}} ({{member.id}})
• **Compte créé le** : <t:{{createdTimestamp}}:f> (<t:{{createdTimestamp}}:R>)
• **Nous a rejoint le** : <t:{{joinedTimestamp}}:f> (<t:{{joinedTimestamp}}:R>)
• **Nous a quitté le** : <t:{{leftTimestamp}}:f> (<t:{{leftTimestamp}}:R>)

log.buttonUsed: A button has just been pressed!
log.commandUsed: A command has just been used!
log.roleAdded_one: A role has just been assigned!
log.roleAdded_other: Several roles have just been assigned!
log.roleRemoved_one: A role has just been removed!
log.roleRemoved_other: Several roles have just been removed!
log.reactionAdded_one: <@{{userId}}> just reacted with the emoji {{emoji}} to get the role {{- roleId}}.
log.reactionAdded_other: <@{{userId}}> just reacted with the emoji {{emoji}} to get the roles {{- roleId}}.
log.reactionRemoved_one: <@{{userId}}> just unreacted with the emoji {{emoji}} to quit the role {{- roleId}}.
log.reactionRemoved_other: <@{{userId}}> just unreacted with the emoji {{emoji}} to quit the roles {{- roleId}}.

• **Message supprimé dans le salon** : <#{{channelId}}>
• **Contenu du message** :

{{- content}}
